title: Noticed a rise in surveys recently?
content:
Are you tired of ðŸ¥·ers asking you to fill out some random dumbshit survey about the taste of wool?

do you dislike having to fill out forms for someone else's research?

well, we here at the survey cartel of PES University would love to hear from you!

Simply write a letter to us in [this format](https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ) and then shove it up your ass, cuz lowkey we dont give af

we'll send a kpgillion more surveys into ALL YOUR GROUP CHATS and banish you into the dark worlds of the survey-realm

Sincerely,
The Fuck-You Committee
Survey Cartel
PES University - 560472

comments.body: It's for their coursework or CIE. Nothing wrong with that.
If you're not interested, just ignore it. At least they're not doing timepass unlike you.
4th line samay raina joke detected. also quit the bullshit, you would be asking for survey fillouts yourself too sooner or later
